title: [Orcswold, Fields]
description: A rectangular stone as tall as a giantman stands alone beside the path, its ancient markings obscured by age and weather.  A strong animal smell wafts though the air, drowning out the delicate scent of the wildflowers that sprout from the grass around the standing stone.

A rectangular stone as tall as a giantman stands alone in the moonlight beside the path, its ancient markings obscured by age and weather.  A strong animal smell wafts though the air, drowning out the delicate scent of the wildflowers that sprout from the grass around the standing stone.
